name: Tommy Miah
bio: Tommy Miah is a well-known Bangladeshi chef who has written several cookbooks and is the founder of the International Indian Chef of the Year Competition.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.method: 1. Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water. 2. Beat eggs, pecorino cheese, and black pepper in a bowl. 3. In a pan, cook pancetta until crispy. 4. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. 5. Remove from heat and add egg mixture, stirring until creamy.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Roll out pizza dough. 2. Spread tomato sauce on top. 3. Add mozzarella cheese. 4. Bake in a preheated oven at 425°F for 12-15 minutes. 5. Garnish with fresh basil.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.method: 1. Brew espresso and let it cool. 2. Beat egg yolks and sugar in a bowl until creamy. 3. Add mascarpone cheese and mix well. 4. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form. 5. Gently fold egg whites into the mascarpone mixture. 6. Dip ladyfingers in the espresso and arrange in a dish. 7. Cover with the mascarpone mixture. 8. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. 9. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

name: Chef John
bio: Chef John has been a professional chef for over 10 years, specializing in Italian cuisine.
